entities.name: quidditch
entities.description: Quidditch is mentioned as the sport that Malfoy was supposed to play in. The text states 'robes his mind was far from Quidditch' indicating that Quidditch is on his mind.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as a Slytherin student who is not playing in the match. The text states 'Why was he now happy to let a substitute go on? Was he really ill, or was he faking?' indicating that Malfoy's absence from the game is suspicious.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as Harry's friend who is surprised by Malfoy's absence. The text states '‘Fishy , isn’t it?’ he said in an undertone to Ron.' indicating that Ron is being spoken to by someone else.

entities.name: vaisey
entities.description: Vaisey is mentioned as the Slytherins' best goal-scorer who is also absent from the match. The text states 'And Vaisey off too...' indicating that Vaisey's absence is notable.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as Ron's friend who is being stared at by Ron. The text states '‘What?’ ‘I ... you ...’ Ron had dropped his voice; he looked both' indicating that Harry is the subject of Ron's attention.

relationships.description: Malfoy is absent from Quidditch, which is suspicious given his previous claims of injury.
Ron is staring at Harry, indicating that Ron's attention is focused on Harry.
